title: Vecnum freeQENCE stem delivers 30mm of adjustable 4-bar suspension for your gravel bike
content:
German component maker Vecnum promises more mixed-surface comfort with an all-new freeQENCE suspension stem. Looking to smooth the ride of almost any bike with a rigid fork – road, gravel, cyclocross, commuter, or touring bikes –  the new 4-bar parallelogram stem delivers more travel than we’re used to seeing in suspension stem, with easy adjustability

The post Vecnum freeQENCE stem delivers 30mm of adjustable 4-bar suspension for your gravel bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
